about_the_game:
ABOUT THE GAME

Intercolonies is a simulation-adventure game set in a post-apocalyptic world where you transport passengers between colonies while fighting for survival. Abandoned structures, treacherous roads, and unknown enemies make every step in this world a challenge. Customize your vehicle and make strategic decisions to safely deliver your passengers to their destination.

What's in this DEMO:

Explore the first biome of Intercolonies! In this demo, you'll experience a one-time passenger transport between two colonies. Other biomes and expanded content will be available in the full version.

What's in the full version:

  • It's your responsibility to transport passengers between colonies in an environment dominated by dangerous roads and harsh biomes. Each journey requires you to strategize to survive.

  • In the post-apocalyptic world, customizing your vehicle to deal with the challenges of biomes is an important requirement. You can make dangerous roads safer by choosing suitable wheels for different terrains. You can reflect your style by changing the color of your vehicle and reveal your identity by personalizing your license plate. With modifications that will increase engine power, you can gain speed and durability in difficult conditions. Each customization offers a significant advantage in your fight for survival!

  • Exploring the environment is the key to survival. Different biomes are full of hidden resources and surprises. Each exploration offers new challenges and opportunities. Be careful in dangerous areas; you may encounter enemies. By exploring the environment, you can find the necessary materials to survive and develop your strategies. With your explorations, you gain experience and write your own story!

  • You will encounter bandits and various threats that will try to stop you. It is important to think strategically and develop quick reflexes to defeat the enemies. Each conflict offers opportunities that will increase your chances of survival.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500 @ 3,3 GHz (4 CPUs)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce RTX 2050
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 @ 3,2 GHz (4 CPUs)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce RTX 2070
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Intercolonies is an exciting simulation-adventure game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Navigate dangerous roads to transport passengers between colonies, customize your vehicle, and protect those you carry from all sorts of threats. Explore different biomes and develop smart strategies to survive.
